title: Welcome
description: As a junior front-end developer, I am driven by the passion to craft captivating and intuitive web experiences. Recently graduated from OpenClassrooms Web Integrator program, I've built a strong foundation in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript and am eager to put my freshly acquired knowledge into practice. My portfolio reflects my journey, showcasing the projects I've worked on with dedication and creativity. Explore these accomplishments to discover how I can contribute to bringing your ideas to life through appealing web interfaces.

title: Booki
description: The company aims to develop a website that allows users to find accommodations and activities in the city of their choice. I was tasked with integrating the site's interface using HTML and CSS code.
skills: Setting up a front-end development environment, Integrating content, Implementing a responsive interface.

title: Kasa
description: Kasa hired me as a freelance front-end developer to develop its new web platform. I had to create a real estate rental web application with React.
skills: Implement CSS animations. Set up an application with Create React App. Configure navigation between application pages. Build a web interface using Sass.

title: Argent Bank
description: I have integrated Argent Bank as a front-end developer. Argent Bank is a new online bank looking to make a mark in the banking sector.
skills: Display backend data on the interface through API calls. Configure API routes for client/server communication. Implement data management with Redux to ensure frontend functionality.

title: 77 Events
description: As a freelance front-end developer, the event agency 724events has contacted me for a mission. The website is functional, but some bugs are hindering its proper use by visitors. The agency reached out to me to finalize the work.
skills: Debug the website using Chrome DevTools. Write a test plan to test the website.
